mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT h.id, h.name, rh.width_value, component, description, preview_img, order_num FROM t_user_role ur JOIN t_role_home rh ON ur.role_id = rh.role_id JOIN t_home h ON rh.home_id = h.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY order_num;

SELECT DISTINCT h.id, h.name, h.width_value, component, preview_img, description FROM t_home h WHERE h.id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT h.id FROM t_user_role ur JOIN t_role_home rh ON ur.role_id = rh.role_id JOIN t_home h ON rh.home_id = h.id WHERE user_id = #{userId});
